snippet: Hamilton E. James Jr., the president of Blackstone and one of the few prominent Democratic supporters from the private equity world, will host a fund-raiser for Mr. Obama in mid-May.
abstract: Hamilton E. James Jr., the president of Blackstone and one of the few prominent Democratic supporters from the private equity world, will host a fund-raiser for Mr. Obama in mid-May.

headline.main: A Fund-Raiser for Obama, With a Host From the Private Equity World
